text: Shahid Beheshti Teachers Training College is a college in Mashhad dedicated to training teachers for Iran education system. It has been named after Ayatollah Mohammad Beheshti, an Iranian clergyman who was very influential in Iran Revolution. ==See also== *Higher Education in Iran ==References== ==External links== *Shahid Beheshti TTC official website Category:Universities in Iran Category:Education in Razavi Khorasan Province
title: Shahid Beheshti Teacher Training College
